summary: BuildRequest contains no requirements or acceptance criteria, so no missing requirements can be identified. The diff introduces unrequested product data and Categories page UI/content changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/expanded static product catalog data including thepla variants, pickle products, and category list.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest, but the diff modifies product definitions and category arrays.

hallucinated_features.description: Categories page now renders thepla categories via carousels, adds an 'Other Products' section with quantity controls, and displays a scrolling marquee message 'Quantity can be customized'.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest, but the diff modifies the Categories page UI and behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/updated slow scrolling marquee animation utility (mentioned in summary).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest, but the diff summary claims Tailwind config changes to add a slow scrolling animation for the marquee.
